attributes.action: Let people in red zones  back to the uk if negative let them isolate at home
attributes.additional_details: Please help us get home we will isolate at home our medication has now run out and we are taking alternative meds we both have heart problems and I have COPD
attributes.background: My wife and I have medical issues we are in our mid seventies we have been vaccinated we have had 5 negative tests and we take a lot of medication we came out to Bahrain on the 19/5/21 as my wife’s daughter was having a baby after three days here Bahrain went into lockdown we have been in isolation
